product_name: Giro SPF Ultralight Bike Cap - Men's
long_description: Designed to be worn under a helmet, the men's ultra-thin Giro SPF Ultralight Bike Cap offers sun protection and a brim to help shade your eyes. X-Static(R) performance jersey mesh top panel offers UPF 30 sun protection from harmful UV rays. Elastic rear panel provides a wide range of fit; one size fits most. Smart seams in the men's Giro SPF Ultralight Bike Cap help alleviate pressure points when worn under a helmet.
short_description: Designed to be worn under a helmet, the men's ultra-thin Giro SPF Ultralight Bike Cap offers sun protection and a brim to help shade your eyes.
